Use of scheduleAtFixedRate is strongly discouraged because it can lead to unexpected behavior when Android processes become cached (tasks may unexpectedly execute hundreds or thousands of times in quick succession when a process changes from cached to uncached); prefer using scheduleWithFixedDelay More... (Ctrl+F1) Inspection info: Discouraged APIs are allowed and are not deprecated, but they may be unfit for common use (e.g. due to slow performance or subtle behavior).

Submits a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next. The sequence of task executions continues indefinitely until one of the following exceptional completions occur: The task is explicitly cancelled via the returned future. The executor terminates, also resulting in task cancellation. An execution of the task throws an exception. In this case calling get on the returned future will throw ExecutionException, holding the exception as its cause. Subsequent executions are suppressed. Subsequent calls to isDone() on the returned future will return true. Params: command – the task to execute initialDelay – the time to delay first execution delay – the delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next unit – the time unit of the initialDelay and delay parameters Returns: a ScheduledFuture representing pending completion of the series of repeated tasks. The future's get() method will never return normally, and will throw an exception upon task cancellation or abnormal termination of a task execution.

android root 后获取 CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE 权限

检查下 这段 sql 有没有 错误 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `tb_board` (" + "`id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL," + " `is_default` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `net_id` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `sn` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `addr` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `bind_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `company_id` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `create_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `delete_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `tcp_addr` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `serialPath` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `serialPort` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 9600," + " `lockBoard` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `qrcode` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `net` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `offline_qrcode` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `edit_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `banner_cache_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `reboot_interval` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `retry_reboot_interval` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `h5_url` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `uart_url` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '' " + " )",

这段代码 有没有问题 //1 update tb_board //将 tb_board 表重命名 tb_board_old database.execSQL("ALTER TABLE tb_board RENAME TO tb_board_old") //创建新表 tb_board database.execSQL( "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `tb_board` (" + " `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL," + " `is_default` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `net_id` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `sn` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `addr` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `bind_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `company_id` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `create_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `delete_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `tcp_addr` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `serialPath` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `serialPort` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 9600," + " `lockBoard` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `qrcode` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `net` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `offline_qrcode` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `edit_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `banner_cache_time` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `reboot_interval` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `retry_reboot_interval` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0," + " `h5_url` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT ''," + " `uart_url` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '' " + " ) ;", ) // 复制 tb_board_old 到 tb_board database.execSQL( "INSERT INTO tb_board (id,is_default,net_id,sn,addr,bind_time,company_id,create_time,delete_time,tcp_addr,serialPath,serialPort,lockBoard,qrcode,net,offline_qrcode,edit_time,banner_cache_time,reboot_interval,retry_reboot_interval,h5_url,uart_url) " + "SELECT id,is_default,net_id,sn,addr,bind_time,company_id,create_time,delete_time,tcp_addr,serialPath,serialPort,lockBoard,qrcode,net,offline_qrcode,edit_time,banner_cache_time,reboot_interval,retry_reboot_interval,h5_url,uart_url FROM tb_board_old;", ) // 删除 tb_board_old database.execSQL("DROP TABLE tb_board_old")
